name: flax production | flax plant, harvested | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21211/documentation

This inventory dataset covers the field activity for the production of 1 kg of Flax plant  in 2016-17 through Flax cultivation. The transformation of Flax from the Flax plant (green matter) - the Flax retting and dressing process - is not included here.; The dataset incorporates all necessary inputs for the agricultural production of the reference product and is an extrapolation from the respective Indian dataset.;Machinery and fixed overhead are excluded from life cycle inventory for the activity, since the machineries and fixed overheads provide services over several years, and their impacts per kg of Flax plant is very low. The result of this activity is 1 kg Flax green matter.

This activity begins from land preparation for sowing.


This activity ends with harvesting of mature flax plant.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/011:Growing of non-perennial crops/0116:Growing of fibre crops

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is an extrapolation of Indian dataset
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Cultivation of flax from conventional production standards
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data on inputs to the field activites are collected directly from the farmers and farming experts. However, the emission data were not readily available for India. Hence, Ecoinvent LCI calculation tool for crop production was used to calculate field emissions from the cultivation process.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data has been collected through field visit and interview. Data has been obtained from a Sunnhemp Research Station in Uttar Pradesh (North India) as they have pioneered the introduction and promoted the cultivation of Flax in India as per optimised technology and expressed willingness to share the data.
